text: ヒンメルス・クレストで暮らす赤髪の少女。
english_text: A red-haired girl living in Himmels Crest.

text: 活発。　ポジティブ思考。　俺とは正反対の性格をしている。
english_text: Energetic. Positive thinker. She has a personality that is completely opposite to mine.

text: 趣味は絵本鑑賞。　御伽噺や伝承には目がない。
english_text: Her hobby is looking at picture books. She has a passion for fairy tales and folklore.

text: 文字の読み書きが苦手で、最近は毎日教えている。
english_text: She struggles with reading and writing_ so I've been teaching her every day recently.

text: ……別に乗り気ではない。　ダスティンさんに頼まれたから仕方なくだ。
english_text: ...Not that I’m enthusiastic about it. I'm only doing it because Dustin asked me to.

text: 大人への憧れが強く、それが災いしてよくドジを踏んでいる。
english_text: She has a strong desire to become an adult_ which often causes her to blunder.

text: エレナの義父であり家の主。
english_text: Elena’s adoptive father and the head of the household.

text: かなり豪胆な性格で嘘や曲がった行いを嫌う。
english_text: He has a very bold personality and dislikes lies and crooked behavior.

text: ここで暮らし始めて、あの人には助けられてばかりだ。
english_text: Since I started living here_ I’ve been constantly helped by him.

text: 趣味は……書いてて気付いたが、聞いたことがない。
english_text: As for his hobbies... now that I think about it_ I’ve never asked.

text: 昼間は昔の新聞を読んでいるか、倉庫で農作業道具の手入れをしている。
english_text: During the day_ he’s either reading old newspapers or maintaining farming tools in the shed.

text: 夜はエレナに隠れて晩酌……ぐらいか。(ちなみに超下戸)
english_text: At night_ he secretly drinks behind Elena's back... even though he gets drunk easily.

text: ……考えてみれば、結構ミステリアスな部分が多いかもしれない。
english_text: ...Come to think of it_ he might have a lot of mysterious aspects.
